00074         public override string Encode(byte[] Input)
00075         {
00076             if (Input == null)
00077             {
00078                 throw new ArgumentNullException("Input can not be null");
00079             }
00080             StringBuilder Output = new StringBuilder();
00081             foreach (byte Index in Input)
00082             {
00083                 if ((Index < 33 || Index > 126 || Index == 0x3D)
00084                     && Index != 0x09 && Index != 0x20 && Index != 0x0D && Index != 0x0A)
00085                 {
00086                     int Code = (int)Index;
00087                     Output.AppendFormat("={0}", Code.ToString("X2"));
00088                 }
00089                 else
00090                 {
00091                     Output.Append(System.Convert.ToChar(Index));
00092                 }
00093             }
00094             Output.Replace(" \r", "=20\r", 0, Output.Length);
00095             Output.Replace("\t\r", "=09\r", 0, Output.Length);
00096             Output.Replace("\r\n.\r\n", "\r\n=2E\r\n", 0, Output.Length);
00097             Output.Replace(" ", "=20", Output.Length - 1, 1);
00098             return FormatEncodedString(Output.ToString());
00099         }

00109         protected void DecodeOneLine(MemoryStream Stream,string CurrentLine)
00110         {
00111             if (Stream == null || string.IsNullOrEmpty(CurrentLine))
00112             {
00113                 throw new ArgumentNullException("Input variables can not be null");
00114             }
00115             for (int x = 0, y = 0; x < CurrentLine.Length; ++x, ++y)
00116             {
00117                 byte CurrentByte;
00118                 if (CurrentLine[x] == '=')
00119                 {
00120                     if (x + 2 > CurrentLine.Length) break;
00121                     if (IsHex(CurrentLine[x + 1]) && IsHex(CurrentLine[x + 2]))
00122                     {
00123                         string HexCode = CurrentLine.Substring(x + 1, 2);
00124                         CurrentByte = Convert.ToByte(HexCode, 16);
00125                         x += 2;
00126                     }
00127                     else
00128                     {
00129                         CurrentByte = Convert.ToByte(CurrentLine[++x]);
00130                     }
00131                 }
00132                 else
00133                 {
00134                     CurrentByte = Convert.ToByte(CurrentLine[x]);
00135                 }
00136                 Stream.WriteByte(CurrentByte);
00137             }
00138             if (!CurrentLine.EndsWith("="))
00139             {
00140                 Stream.WriteByte(0x0D);
00141                 Stream.WriteByte(0x0A);
00142             }
00143         }

00165                         string CurrentLine;

00167                         StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();

00175                                         while(Index < CurrentLine.Length)
00176                                         {
00177                                                 if(IsHex(CurrentLine[Index]) && IsHex(CurrentLine[Index-1]) && CurrentLine[Index-2] == '=')
00178                                                 {
00179                                                         Index -= 2;
00180                                                 }
00181                                                 Builder.Append(CurrentLine.Substring(LastIndex, Index - LastIndex));
00182                                                 Builder.Append("=\r\n");
00183                         LastIndex = Index;
00184                                                 Index += MAX_CHAR_LEN;
00185                                         }
00186                                         Builder.Append(CurrentLine.Substring(LastIndex, CurrentLine.Length - LastIndex));
00187                                         Builder.Append("\r\n");
00188                                 }
00189                                 return Builder.ToString();
00190                         }
00191                         finally
00192                         {
00193                                 Reader.Close();
00194                                 Reader=null;
